Question: Shenzhen Hohem Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Hohem Technology Co., Ltd.

Product: Hohem Mic-01 Wireless Microphone

- Portable and easy to use wireless microphone
- Cutting-edge DSP noise cancellation for clean and clear audio
- 48kHz sampling rate, 64dB signal-to-noise ratio, and 2.4GHz transmission for high-fidelity sound
- Ultra-long battery life with 7.5 hours duration and up to 20 hours with charging case
- 656ft (200m) stable and high fidelity audio receiving work distance
- Compact and lightweight design at 110.8g and 80.0mm x 64.0mm x 30.6mm (W/H/D)
- Available for both lightning and Android versions
- Sold globally through store.hohem.com and Amazon
- Known for Gimbals Stabilizer and innovative AI features
- Dedicated to making photography and film-making equipment more accessible and intelligent
